title: Relief items were sent to Sindhupalchok
content: Sent $1000.00 to Nepal to Mr. Balkrishna Paudel on 04/30/2015 thru Sahas Shrestha whose team is going to and will go to affected areas of Sindhupalchok etc.Two of our groups went to Sindhupalchok yesterday. I'll report in details later as available, here is a preliminary report: Group 1 via Pratik Shrestha: They went to Sindhupalchow, Ward No. 3, I forgot the name of the VDC. They mainly distributed sanitary items. They promised to upload picture today. I'll share as soon as I have the link. Group 2 via Balkrishna Paudel: They went to Pangretar-4, Sindhupalchok. Distributed 50 tents (Tripal), 2 Bundle Plastic, 3 sacks full Chiura and dalmot. They are going there today as well and are preparing for more tents. Both of the group went to Sankhu yesterday.
